segments.description: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.description_enhanced:
**Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi**

As your private jet descends, Nairobi shimmers below, a tapestry of green and ochre hues kissed by the equatorial sun. You’ll touch down at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, a bustling hub that serves as your gateway to the unparalleled adventures that await you in East Africa. While merely a transit point on this exclusive journey, allow yourself a moment to absorb the vibrant energy of Kenya’s capital.

Even within the airport's embrace, a curated experience awaits. Consider indulging in a revitalizing spa treatment at one of the airport lounges, melting away any lingering travel fatigue with aromatherapy and expertly administered massage. Perhaps you’ll choose to savour a perfectly brewed Kenyan coffee, its rich aroma a tantalizing preview of the sensory delights to come.

Before continuing on your bespoke itinerary, take a moment to reflect on the authentic culture that surrounds you. Listen to the Swahili greetings exchanged between locals, observe the intricate patterns woven into traditional fabrics, and breathe in the fragrant blend of spices emanating from the nearby cafes.

This is more than just a transfer; it's a fleeting introduction to the warmth and vibrancy of East Africa, a tantalizing hint of the intimate experiences that lie ahead on your meticulously planned, luxury safari. It’s a promise of adventure, whispered on the equatorial breeze, urging you onward to the unparalleled wonders that await. Embrace this momentary pause, for it is the prelude to an unforgettable journey.

segments.description: On arrival at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, a Tradewinds Aviation Services representative will meet you at the main terminal with your name on a signboard. The representative will assist you through customs and immigration and to collect your luggage. You are accompanied to the arrivals hall where you will meet the transfer representative for your onward journey.
segments.name: Meet and Assist at Nairobi
segments.title: Meet and Assist at Nairobi
segments.description_enhanced:
**Meet and Assist at Nairobi: A Seamless Arrival**

As your flight touches down at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, signaling the start of your East African adventure, prepare for a completely seamless and stress-free arrival experience. Disembark the aircraft and breathe in the warm Kenyan air, knowing that a dedicated Tradewinds Aviation Services representative awaits to whisk you away from the bustle and into a realm of effortless transition.

Upon entering the main terminal, you'll be greeted by a friendly face holding a signboard bearing your name, a welcome beacon in the vibrant airport atmosphere. This is the start of your exclusive, curated journey. Your personal assistant will then expertly navigate you through the often-complex procedures of customs and immigration, ensuring a swift and effortless passage.

Imagine gliding through the formalities, bypassing any potential queues, while your representative handles the necessary paperwork with practiced ease. Feel the weight of responsibility lift from your shoulders as you are personally guided every step of the way.

Next, your Tradewinds representative will assist you in retrieving your luggage, ensuring all your belongings are safely collected. Finally, you'll be accompanied to the arrivals hall, where you will be introduced to the transfer representative awaiting to escort you on the next stage of your bespoke itinerary. This intimate and personalized service is designed to provide you with an authentic taste of Kenyan hospitality from the moment you arrive, allowing you to relax and fully embrace the extraordinary experiences that lie ahead. Let us transform your arrival into an unforgettable and truly luxurious start to your adventure.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelFor: Hemingways Nairobi
segments.description: You'll be met by a representative of Wilderness  and transferred from Jomo Kenyatta Airport to Hemingways Nairobi by private vehicle.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelForName: Hemingways Nairobi
segments.title: Jomo Kenyatta Airport to Hemingways Nairobi
segments.description_enhanced:
**Jomo Kenyatta Airport to Hemingways Nairobi: A Sanctuary Awaits**

As you step off the plane at Jomo Kenyatta Airport, breathing in the warm Kenyan air, the adventure truly begins. Leave the bustle of travel behind; a representative from Wilderness, known for their unparalleled dedication to crafting authentic and exclusive experiences, will be waiting to greet you.

From this moment forward, your journey will be seamless. You'll be whisked away from the airport crowds in a private, meticulously maintained vehicle, a sanctuary of calm amidst the vibrant energy of Nairobi. Sink into the plush leather seats and feel the gentle hum of the engine as you begin your transition from international travel to the serene haven that awaits.

The drive to Hemingways Nairobi is more than just a transfer; it’s an introduction to the city. As you glide along, take in the sights – the colorful roadside markets, the elegant architecture, the lush greenery that hints at the natural beauty beyond the city limits. Your knowledgeable driver can provide insights into Nairobi's rich history and contemporary culture, offering a glimpse into the soul of this captivating city.

Arriving at Hemingways Nairobi is like stepping into a timeless world of elegance and sophistication. The grandeur of the plantation-style architecture is immediately apparent, evoking a sense of old-world charm blended with modern luxury. This bespoke hotel, renowned for its intimate atmosphere and impeccable service, promises an unforgettable start to your Kenyan adventure. Feel the stress of travel melt away as you’re personally welcomed, ready to immerse yourself in the curated comforts and unparalleled hospitality that define Hemingways Nairobi. The journey from the airport wasn't merely a transfer; it was the first step into an experience of a lifetime.

segments.description:
Between the rolling Ngong Hills and the vast Nairobi National Park lies Hemingways Nairobi, a boutique all-suite hotel offering a serene escape from the bustle of the city. Set in the leafy suburb of Karen, just minutes from cultural landmarks like the Karen Blixen Museum and the Giraffe Centre, it is perfectly placed for both relaxation and exploration. 

The spacious suites feature vaulted ceilings, elegant living spaces, and private terraces with sweeping views. Every detail is considered, from personalised butler service to luxury bathroom amenities, promising the highest level of comfort. During your stay, enjoy the hotel’s brasserie and bar, an indulgent spa, outdoor pool, and fitness centre, creating a retreat that feels both luxurious and personal. 

Days here can be as leisurely or adventurous as you wish. Spot wildlife on the edge of Nairobi National Park, tee off at nearby Karen Golf Club, or visit the Daphne Sheldrick Animal Orphanage to see rescued elephants up close. Evenings invite you to return for fine dining and a cocktail at sunset, framed by the hills. 

INSIDER’S TIP: Ask your butler to arrange a morning excursion into Nairobi National Park, you might spot lions hunting with the city skyline in the distance.
segments.title: Hemingways Nairobi
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Deluxe Suite: Bed and breakfast inclusive of taxes, express check in and check out, butler valet services, free WIFI connectivity, satellite television, complimentary use of the gym, sauna, steam and outdoor heated pool, unlimited supply of mineral water in the room.
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Deluxe Suite: Bed and breakfast inclusive of taxes, express check in and check out, butler valet services, free WIFI connectivity, satellite television, complimentary use of the gym, sauna, steam and outdoor heated pool, unlimited supply of mineral water in the room.
segments.description_enhanced:
**Hemingways Nairobi: A Sanctuary of Sophistication**

Imagine escaping the vibrant energy of Nairobi, retreating to an **exclusive** haven where tranquility reigns supreme. Nestled between the verdant embrace of the rolling Ngong Hills and the untamed beauty of the vast Nairobi National Park lies Hemingways Nairobi, a boutique all-suite hotel that promises a serene and **authentic** escape from the city’s bustle.

Located in the prestigious and leafy suburb of Karen, a historical area brimming with charm, Hemingways Nairobi offers an idyllic setting just moments from cultural landmarks. The spirit of a bygone era whispers through the air as you consider a visit to the Karen Blixen Museum, stepping into the world of "Out of Africa," or perhaps an intimate encounter at the Giraffe Centre, where gentle giants await your gaze. Its perfectly placed location provides a launchpad for both invigorating exploration and restorative relaxation.

Step inside your spacious suite and be enveloped in an atmosphere of understated elegance. Vaulted ceilings soar above, creating a sense of airy grandeur, while exquisitely designed living spaces offer havens of comfort and style. Each suite boasts a private terrace, an invitation to savor sweeping views of the lush landscape as the warm African sun kisses your skin. Here, you can lose yourself in the symphony of birdsong and the gentle rustling of leaves, feeling a million miles away from the urban hum.

At Hemingways Nairobi, every detail is meticulously considered, designed to anticipate your every need. From the **bespoke** service of your personalized butler, ensuring a seamless and unforgettable stay, to the lavish luxury bathroom amenities, no indulgence is spared. Expect the highest level of comfort, a feeling of being utterly pampered and cared for.

During your stay, immerse yourself in the hotel’s sophisticated offerings. The brasserie and bar beckon with tantalizing culinary creations and expertly crafted cocktails. Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul at the indulgent spa, a sanctuary of serenity. Bask in the warmth beside the outdoor pool, a shimmering oasis under the Kenyan sky. Or maintain your fitness regime at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Hemingways Nairobi creates a retreat that feels both undeniably luxurious and deeply personal, a place where you can truly unwind and reconnect with yourself.

Days here unfold at your desired pace, as leisurely or adventurous as you wish. Embark on thrilling wildlife encounters on the edge of Nairobi National Park, where the possibility of spotting majestic creatures in their natural habitat is ever present. Perfect your swing at the nearby Karen Golf Club, a prestigious course steeped in history. Or experience the heartwarming work of the Daphne Sheldrick Animal Orphanage, where you can witness rescued elephants up close, their innocent eyes melting your heart.

As the sun begins its descent, casting a golden glow over the Ngong Hills, evenings invite you to return to Hemingways Nairobi for an experience of fine dining. Savor exquisite flavors and impeccable service before retreating to the bar for a perfectly mixed cocktail, a final toast to a day of unforgettable experiences, framed by the majestic hills. This **curated** experience offers an intimate connection to the heart of Kenya.

INSIDER’S TIP: Ask your butler to arrange a morning excursion into Nairobi National Park. Imagine the thrill of potentially spotting lions hunting with the dramatic city skyline providing a truly unique and unforgettable backdrop. This is a moment that will forever be etched in your memory.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelFor: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.description:
Scheduled flight from Wilson Airport to Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs.

Baggage allowance is strictly 15 Kgs per passenger, inclusive of hand luggage in soft bags 
Excess baggage will be charged at prevailing rates and only carried subject to space availability.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelForName: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.title: Wilson Airport to Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.description_enhanced:
**Wilson Airport to Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs: A Seamless Transition to Untamed Luxury**

Your Kenyan adventure truly begins as you transition from the bustling energy of Nairobi to the serene wilderness of Loisaba. This leg of your journey is a meticulously planned, scheduled flight from Wilson Airport, your gateway to an **exclusive** safari experience at Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs.

As you board the aircraft at Wilson Airport, feel the anticipation building. The city fades beneath you, replaced by a tapestry of rolling hills and the vast, open landscapes that define Kenya's unparalleled beauty. Breathe deeply and allow yourself to be transported, both physically and mentally, to the heart of authentic Africa.

This is more than just a flight; it’s the next chapter in your **curated** journey, carefully designed to provide a seamless and luxurious experience.

Kindly remember that the baggage allowance is strictly 15 Kgs per passenger, inclusive of hand luggage, and must be packed in soft bags. This restriction ensures the aircraft's optimal performance and your comfort during the flight. Understand that this policy is in place for safety and the overall flight experience.

While we understand the desire to bring all your essentials, excess baggage will be charged at prevailing rates and can only be carried subject to space availability. Our team at Wilson Airport is happy to assist you with any baggage needs, ensuring a smooth and efficient departure. Planning your packing accordingly will ensure an easy and stress-free transition to your **intimate** and unforgettable safari at Loisaba Lodo Springs. Prepare to be captivated by the **authentic** beauty awaiting you.

segments.description:
Located within the 57,000-acre Loisaba Conservancy, Loisaba Lodo Springs has been purposely designed for guests to enjoy the sweeping views over this magical area in northern Kenya. Elegant in design and opulent in décor, the camp features eight spacious en-suite rooms, each with large floor-to-ceiling doors and windows, as well as beautiful polished wooden floors. The private verandah embraces the camp’s tranquil setting, ensuring that guests enjoy breathtaking vistas of the Laikipia plains from every vantage point. The main area incorporates a cozy lounge, dining area, and a relaxing infinity swimming pool.

INSIDER’S TIP: For a unique cultural experience, spend an afternoon down at the traditional Maasai village – a great opportunity to see how the residents live, watch a dance performance, and admire their intricate beadwork.
segments.title: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Tented room: All meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner), soft drinks, beer, house wines and selected spirits, teas, coffees and refreshments (on the property), and laundry services. Scheduled and shared game drives, guided walking safari, Ngare Ndare Forest Visit, sundowners, bush breakfast, and transfers to and from our designated airstrips are included as well., The game package excludes champagne, private cellar wines and premium spirits/beers
segments.clientIncludeExclude:
Tented room: Includes: All meals, selected alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, scheduled shared safari activities and daily laundry.
Excludes: Champagne, private cellar wines, premium beers and spirits.
segments.description_enhanced:
**Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs: A Sanctuary of Style and Serenity**

Nestled within the vast, untamed beauty of the 57,000-acre Loisaba Conservancy in northern Kenya, Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs is more than just a lodge; it’s an exclusive sanctuary meticulously designed to immerse you in the breathtaking panorama of this magical region. Imagine waking to the symphony of the African bush, the air crisp and clean, carrying the scent of sun-baked earth and distant acacia blossoms.

From the moment you arrive, you'll be enveloped in an atmosphere of understated elegance and authentic African charm. Loisaba Lodo Springs is opulent in décor, yet maintains a deep connection to its wild surroundings. The camp features eight spacious, en-suite rooms, each a private haven of tranquility. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by the warm glow of polished wooden floors and the inviting embrace of bespoke furnishings. Large floor-to-ceiling doors and windows blur the line between indoors and out, offering uninterrupted, sweeping views that stretch as far as the eye can see.

Your private verandah becomes your personal viewing deck, embracing the camp’s tranquil setting. Here, time slows down. Sip your morning coffee as you witness the first rays of sun paint the Laikipia plains in hues of gold and ochre, or unwind with a sundowner as the African night comes alive with the sounds of the wild. Every vantage point offers a breathtaking vista, a constant reminder of the raw, untamed beauty that surrounds you.

The heart of Loisaba Lodo Springs is its welcoming main area, thoughtfully designed for intimate gatherings and moments of quiet reflection. Sink into plush sofas in the cozy lounge, where you can share stories of your day's adventures by the crackling fire. The dining area offers a sophisticated setting for savoring curated meals inspired by local flavors. And as the heat of the day lingers, cool off in the relaxing infinity swimming pool, its shimmering waters seemingly merging with the endless horizon.

**INSIDER’S TIP:** For an unforgettable and authentic cultural experience, dedicate an afternoon to visiting the traditional Maasai village. This is more than just a sightseeing trip; it’s a chance to connect with the local community, witness their vibrant way of life, and learn about their ancient traditions. Watch a captivating dance performance, feel the rhythmic beat of the drums resonate through your soul, and admire the intricate beadwork, each piece a testament to their artistry and heritage. This intimate encounter will leave you with a profound appreciation for the rich cultural tapestry of Kenya.

segments.travelEx: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.travelFor: Angama Mara
segments.description:
Scheduled flight from Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs to Angama Mara.

Baggage allowance is strictly 15 Kgs per passenger, inclusive of hand luggage in soft bags 
Excess baggage will be charged at prevailing rates and only carried subject to space availability.
segments.travelExName: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs
segments.travelForName: Angama Mara
segments.title: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs to Angama Mara
segments.description_enhanced:
**Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs to Angama Mara: A Seamless Transition to Safari Paradise**

Prepare for a breathtaking interlude as you transition from the unparalleled luxury of Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs to the iconic landscapes of the Maasai Mara. This scheduled flight offers a seamless and swift transfer, allowing you to maximize your precious time immersed in the wonders of Kenya.

As the sun rises over the Loisaba Private Conservancy, casting a golden glow across the rugged terrain, you'll bid farewell to this exclusive sanctuary and board your light aircraft. Feel the thrill of anticipation as the engines hum to life, ready to whisk you away on a panoramic journey across the vast African plains. From above, witness the sprawling expanse of the Kenyan wilderness unfold beneath you, a tapestry of ochre earth, emerald vegetation, and winding rivers teeming with life. This is an unparalleled opportunity to appreciate the sheer scale and raw beauty of the land.

Remember to adhere to the baggage allowance, which is strictly 15 Kgs per passenger, inclusive of hand luggage in soft bags. This ensures the comfort and safety of all passengers on board. Excess baggage will be charged at prevailing rates and only carried subject to space availability, so pack thoughtfully for your continued adventure. Consider this a chance to streamline your belongings and truly embrace the liberating feeling of traveling light, focusing on the authentic experiences that await.

This curated flight is more than just a transfer; it's an integral part of your luxury safari experience. It's a chance to savor the solitude and reflect on the memories created at Loisaba, while simultaneously building excitement for the intimate wildlife encounters and breathtaking vistas that await you at Angama Mara. This is a transition designed to be as unforgettable as the destinations themselves, a moment to soak in the magic of Kenya from a truly unique perspective.

segments.description:
Perched high above the Great Rift Valley, Angama Mara delivers some of the most dramatic views in Africa, 1,000 feet above the wildlife-rich plains of the Maasai Mara. Its name, meaning “suspended in mid-air” in Swahili, captures the dreamlike magic of this extraordinary location. Just a short 10-minute drive from the Mara Triangle, the lodge sits on a 700-hectare private site with direct access to the reserve and unmatched exclusivity.

Each tented suite is positioned along the escarpment’s edge, offering uninterrupted panoramas through floor-to-ceiling glass fronts. Inside, expect king beds, sleek wooden decks, and elegant interiors that blur the line between safari and luxury. A rim-flow pool, fitness room with valley views, a curated safari shop, and a hands-on photographic studio add thoughtful detail to the experience.

Spend your days tracking the Big Five on game drives, soaring over the savannah in a hot-air balloon, walking along the escarpment, or exploring the Map Room for a deeper understanding of the region. 

Insider’s Tip: Visit the Photographic Studio during your stay, whether you're a seasoned photographer or a total beginner, you can book a private editing session or even print your own mini portfolio to take home.
segments.title: Angama Mara
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Tented Suite: All guided safaris into the Mara Triangle; Guided walking safaris on the Rift Valley escarpment; All meals and drinks (excluding French Champagne & reserve wines); Laundry service & WiFi; All on-property guest experiences; Transfers to and from Angama Mara Airfield or Kichwa Tembo Airstrip; and Childminding (from 18h00 to 22h00
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Tented Suite: Includes: All meals, selected alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, scheduled shared safari activities and daily laundry.
segments.description_enhanced:
**Angama Mara**

Imagine waking to a sunrise that paints the vast canvas of the Masai Mara in hues of gold and rose, a vista so breathtaking it feels like a waking dream. Perched dramatically high above the Great Rift Valley, Angama Mara delivers precisely that – some of the most awe-inspiring views in all of Africa, suspended 1,000 feet above the legendary wildlife-rich plains. Its very name, meaning “suspended in mid-air” in Swahili, perfectly encapsulates the dreamlike magic and ethereal beauty of this extraordinary location. Here, the air is crisp, the silence profound, broken only by the distant calls of birds and the rustling of the savannah below.

Just a short, ten-minute drive transports you to the heart of the Mara Triangle, allowing for seamless access to some of the world’s finest game viewing. But the lodge itself resides on an exclusive 700-hectare private site, granting you direct access to the reserve while ensuring unmatched privacy and tranquility. This curated experience allows you to immerse yourself in the untamed beauty of the Mara, far from the bustling crowds, and fully appreciate the intimate connection between land and wildlife.

Each tented suite is meticulously positioned along the escarpment’s edge, a sanctuary of bespoke luxury designed to seamlessly blend with its natural surroundings. Floor-to-ceiling glass fronts offer uninterrupted panoramas that invite the drama of the African landscape directly into your personal space. Inside, discover king beds swathed in the finest linens, inviting you to sink into restful slumber after a day of adventure. Sleek wooden decks extend outwards, offering the perfect spot to savor a morning coffee as you witness the awakening of the plains. Elegant interiors thoughtfully blur the line between classic safari aesthetics and contemporary luxury, creating a harmonious and inviting atmosphere.

Beyond the exceptional accommodations, Angama Mara offers a wealth of enriching experiences. Take a refreshing dip in the rim-flow pool, seemingly suspended between earth and sky, while soaking in the mesmerizing valley views. Maintain your wellness routine in the state-of-the-art fitness room, where panoramic windows provide unparalleled workout motivation. Discover handcrafted treasures and authentic souvenirs in the carefully curated safari shop. Or, delve into your creative side at the hands-on photographic studio, where you can unlock your inner artist and capture the beauty of your surroundings.

Your days at Angama Mara promise unforgettable moments. Embark on expertly guided game drives, tracking the iconic Big Five across the sprawling plains and witnessing the raw power and grace of the African wildlife. For a truly unforgettable perspective, soar over the savannah in a hot-air balloon, drifting silently above the landscape as the sun casts its golden glow upon the earth. Embrace the serenity of nature with leisurely walks along the escarpment, breathing in the fresh air and marveling at the expansive views. Or, for a deeper understanding of the region's history and geography, explore the Map Room, a treasure trove of knowledge and insight.

**Insider’s Tip:** Don’t miss the opportunity to visit the Photographic Studio during your stay. Whether you are a seasoned photographer seeking expert advice or a total beginner eager to learn the basics, you can book a private editing session with a professional or even curate and print your own mini portfolio to take home – a tangible memento of your unforgettable African adventure. This authentic, hands-on experience provides a unique way to connect with the landscape and preserve your cherished memories of Angama Mara.

segments.description: Masai Mara Park fees
segments.name: Masai Mara Park fees
segments.title: Masai Mara Park fees
segments.description_enhanced:
**Masai Mara Park Fees**

As you prepare to embark on your exclusive safari adventure in the heart of Kenya's Masai Mara, understanding the park fees is an essential part of planning your curated journey. These fees contribute directly to the conservation efforts that protect this incredible ecosystem and its majestic wildlife.

Consider these fees not merely as an expense, but as an investment in preserving one of the world's most precious natural landscapes. They ensure the continuation of vital anti-poaching patrols, support community development initiatives, and fund crucial research that helps us understand and protect the Mara’s delicate balance.

Imagine the thrill of your first game drive, the golden light painting the savanna as you witness a lion pride stalking its prey. Or the quiet awe of observing a herd of elephants lumbering gracefully across the plains, their silhouettes etched against the fiery sunset. These unforgettable experiences are directly linked to the sustainable management of the Masai Mara, which is, in part, supported by these fees.

Think of the park fees as your contribution to the authentic preservation of the Masai Mara. They allow for the continuation of intimate and uncrowded experiences, safeguarding the serenity and unspoiled beauty that defines this iconic destination. By paying these fees, you become a vital partner in ensuring that future generations can experience the same wonder and enchantment that you are about to discover. It is a small price to pay for the privilege of witnessing such breathtaking natural beauty. This is more than a trip; it’s a commitment to conservation, a chance to leave a positive impact, and an opportunity to immerse yourself in the raw, untamed heart of Africa.

segments.description:
Experience the ultimate safari adventure with Governor's Hot Air Balloon Safari over the Masai Mara. As the first light of dawn paints the sky pink, the adventure unfolds. Watch in awe as the hot air balloon fills and lifts off, carrying guests into the vast expanse of the Mara with an unparalleled view of the wildlife below.

The balloon flight lasts for 60 thrilling minutes, offering ample time to spot the Big Five and other magnificent creatures roaming the savannah. Upon landing, enjoy a Champagne breakfast served on the ground, surrounded by the beauty of the Mara landscape. The morning of adventure concludes with a game drive back to camp.

Dress warmly for your hot air balloon safari, as the mornings can be chilly, especially at higher altitudes. Layering clothing ensures you stay comfortable throughout the flight, allowing you to fully enjoy the breathtaking views without feeling cold.
segments.name: Hot Air Ballooning Over the Masai Mara
segments.title: Hot Air Ballooning Over the Masai Mara
segments.description_enhanced:
**Hot Air Ballooning Over the Masai Mara**
_in Masai Mara, Kenya_

Embark on an experience unlike any other – an intimate and authentic safari adventure with Governor's Hot Air Balloon Safari, soaring above the breathtaking Masai Mara. Before the sun even thinks of cresting the horizon, you’ll feel the anticipation building. A pre-dawn wake-up call leads you to the launch site, where the first light delicately paints the African sky in hues of soft pink and lavender – a masterpiece crafted just for you. Watch in awe as the colossal balloon, a symphony of vibrant colors, slowly comes to life, inflating against the backdrop of the awakening savannah. The heat from the burners fills the air, a gentle warmth promising an unforgettable journey.

As the ropes are released, you’ll feel a thrilling lightness as the balloon gracefully lifts off, carrying you into the vast, silent expanse of the Mara. This exclusive perspective provides an unparalleled, panoramic view of the wildlife below, a tapestry of life unfolding beneath your feet. The gentle breeze whispers secrets of the plains as you float serenely above the landscape.

For 60 thrilling minutes, lose yourself in the magic of the Mara. Spot the iconic Big Five – the elephant, rhino, lion, leopard, and buffalo – and other magnificent creatures roaming freely across the endless savannah. Observe herds of zebras galloping, giraffes gracefully reaching for the acacia trees, and perhaps even a glimpse of a cheetah stalking its prey. Each moment offers a new wonder, a new discovery, an indelible memory etched in your mind. This curated aerial safari is a truly exceptional experience.

Upon gently returning to earth, a celebratory and utterly delightful Champagne breakfast awaits. Imagine yourself raising a toast on the very ground you've just surveyed from above, surrounded by the raw, untamed beauty of the Mara landscape. The clinking of glasses mingles with the sounds of the African bush, a symphony of nature welcoming you back. Savor delicious delicacies as the sun climbs higher, casting a golden glow over the plains.

The morning's adventure culminates with a bespoke game drive back to camp, offering one final chance to connect with the land and its inhabitants. Reflect on the extraordinary experience you've just had as you traverse the familiar paths, your heart full of the untamed spirit of Africa.

A gentle reminder to dress warmly for your hot air balloon safari. The mornings in the Masai Mara can be surprisingly chilly, especially at higher altitudes. Layering clothing – a cozy fleece, a light jacket, and perhaps a scarf – ensures you stay perfectly comfortable throughout the flight, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the breathtaking views and the serene magic of the Mara without a shiver.

segments.travelEx: Angama Mara
segments.travelFor: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.description: Scheduled flight from Angama Mara to Ukunda Airstrip.
segments.travelExName: Angama Mara
segments.travelForName: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.title: Angama Mara to Ukunda Airstrip
segments.description_enhanced:
**Angama Mara to Ukunda Airstrip**

Prepare to bid a bittersweet farewell to the breathtaking beauty of the Masai Mara as you embark on a scheduled flight from Angama Mara to Ukunda Airstrip. The dawn chorus of the African bush will still be ringing in your ears as you take off, the memory of those exclusive safari moments already weaving themselves into the tapestry of your memories.

As the bespoke-crafted Land Cruiser transports you to the airstrip, breathe in the crisp morning air, scented with the earthy aroma of the savanna. From above, you’ll gain a final, breathtaking perspective on the vast plains that have played host to your unforgettable adventure.

The small chartered aircraft awaits, promising a smooth and swift transition from the untamed wilderness to the turquoise embrace of the Kenyan coast. Settle into your seat and feel the gentle rumble as the engines awaken.

Below, the landscape transforms from golden grasslands dotted with acacia trees to a patchwork of emerald fields and, finally, the shimmering azure of the Indian Ocean. This curated experience offers a truly unique perspective, a bird's-eye view of Kenya's diverse beauty, seamlessly connecting the raw power of the Mara with the serene tranquility of the coast.

This intimate flight allows you to savor the last moments of your safari, carrying with you the authentic spirit of Africa as you begin the next chapter of your bespoke Kenyan journey. The transition from bush to beach is effortless, promising a continued immersion in luxury and unparalleled experiences. The adventure continues.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.travelFor: Alfajiris Cliff Villa
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.travelForName: Alfajiris Cliff Villa
segments.title: Ukunda Airstrip to Alfajiris Cliff Villa

segments.description:
Escape to Alfajiri Cliff Villa, where your dream getaway awaits. Perched on a coral cliff overlooking the Indian Ocean, this exclusive villa promises unrivalled privacy and breathtaking views. 

Renowned as one of the world’s most romantic bedrooms, the opulent Turret Suite boasts 270-degree panoramic views of the ocean, an ideal spot for honeymooners. The Villa also features two double bedrooms on the first floor and a twin bedroom on the ground floor, accommodating groups of up to nine guests. 

Relaxation knows no bounds here, whether it's sunrise yoga on the generous verandah, a dip in the infinity pool, or strolling through the lush private garden. Your dedicated butler ensures every need is met, from personalised dining experiences to arranging in-villa wellness treatments.

Embark on a culinary journey with all meals and beverages included, featuring exquisite South African wines and premium spirits. Dive into adventure with complimentary snorkelling or unwind with a cultural visit to local villages. Every detail, from private drivers to laundry service, is thoughtfully provided, ensuring a truly indulgent escape at Alfajiri Cliff Villa.

Insider's Tip: Don't miss the opportunity to experience a classic or deep tissue massage daily as part of your stay—it's the ultimate indulgence in paradise.
segments.title: Alfajiris Cliff Villa
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Cliff Villa: Exclusive use of the villa and pool; Full board accommodation; Soft drinks, beers and wines; Non-luxury spirits; Nannies available 24 hours; Personal butler at your disposal; Laundry; WIFI; Guest library and games; Airstrip transfers; Use of Golf clubs; Use of snorkeling equipment., , Activities:, Ngalawa (local African boats) at disposal for excursions to coral reef for snorkeling.; One daily massage per adult and teenager; Chauffeured transport within Diani Beach area; Visit to community project, orphanage; Visit to local villages in Diani beach area; Gym at a nearby property.
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Cliff Villa: Exclusive use of the villa and pool; Full board accommodation; Soft drinks, beers and wines; Non-luxury spirits; Nannies available 24 hours; Personal butler at your disposal; Laundry; WIFI; Guest library and games; Airstrip transfers; Use of Golf clubs; Use of snorkeling equipment., , Activities:, Ngalawa (local African boats) at disposal for excursions to coral reef for snorkeling.; One daily massage per adult and teenager; Chauffeured transport within Diani Beach area; Visit to community project, orphanage; Visit to local villages in Diani beach area; Gym at a nearby property.
segments.description_enhanced:
**Alfajiris Cliff Villa**

Imagine awakening to the symphony of the Indian Ocean, the turquoise waters stretching before you like an endless canvas. This is Alfajiri Cliff Villa, an exclusive sanctuary nestled within the pristine Diani Chale Marine National Reserve in Kenya, where your dream getaway transcends reality. Perched majestically on a coral cliff, this villa promises an intimate escape, far removed from the ordinary, with breathtaking views that will forever be etched in your memory.

Step into a world of unparalleled luxury and discover why Alfajiri Cliff Villa is so highly regarded. At its heart lies the iconic Turret Suite, globally renowned as one of the most romantic bedrooms imaginable. Envision yourselves, perhaps on honeymoon, enveloped by its opulent embrace, with 270-degree panoramic views that capture the ocean's ever-changing moods. From the fiery hues of sunrise painting the sky to the silvery glow of moonlight dancing on the waves, the Turret Suite offers an unforgettable spectacle.

Beyond the Turret Suite, the Villa unfolds with thoughtfully curated spaces designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Two beautifully appointed double bedrooms await on the first floor, each a haven of tranquility. On the ground floor, a charming twin bedroom completes the accommodation, allowing Alfajiri Cliff Villa to comfortably host groups of up to nine guests, ensuring a bespoke experience tailored to your every desire.

Days at Alfajiri Cliff Villa are yours to design. Begin with sunrise yoga on the generous verandah, the gentle sea breeze caressing your skin as you find your inner peace. Afterwards, immerse yourself in the refreshing embrace of the infinity pool, its shimmering surface blending seamlessly with the azure horizon. Or perhaps you prefer a leisurely stroll through the lush, private garden, a verdant paradise teeming with exotic flora and the sweet melodies of tropical birds.

Your dedicated butler stands ready to anticipate your every need, ensuring a seamless and utterly indulgent stay. Allow them to curate personalised dining experiences, transforming each meal into a culinary masterpiece. Indulge in the artistry of the villa’s chefs, preparing delectable dishes using the freshest local ingredients, paired with exceptional South African wines and premium spirits – all included as part of your exclusive Alfajiri experience.

Adventure awaits beyond the villa's walls. Dive into the crystal-clear waters for complimentary snorkelling, discovering the vibrant coral reefs and the kaleidoscope of marine life that thrives beneath the surface. Or embark on an authentic cultural visit to local villages, gaining a deeper understanding of the rich traditions and warm hospitality of the Kenyan people.

Every detail at Alfajiri Cliff Villa has been meticulously considered, ensuring a truly seamless and indulgent escape. From private drivers whisking you away on excursions to the convenience of a comprehensive laundry service, every aspect of your stay is designed to exceed your expectations.

**Insider's Tip:** Surrender to complete relaxation with a complimentary daily classic or deep tissue massage. The skilled therapists will melt away any tension, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and revitalized – the ultimate indulgence in this unparalleled paradise.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.travelFor: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.description: You will take a scheduled light aircraft flight from Ukunda Airstrip to Wilson Airport.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Ukunda Airstrip in Diani Chale Marine National Reserve
segments.travelForName: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.title: Ukunda Airstrip to Wilson Airport
segments.description_enhanced:
As the sun begins its slow descent, casting a warm, golden hue across the Diani Chale Marine National Reserve, you will embark on a seamless transition from coastal paradise to the vibrant heart of Nairobi. Your journey begins with a scheduled light aircraft flight from Ukunda Airstrip to Wilson Airport, an experience in itself that offers breathtaking aerial perspectives.

Forget crowded terminals and impersonal service. This is an exclusive transfer, meticulously planned to ensure your utmost comfort and convenience. Settle into the plush leather seat of the light aircraft as the propellers whir to life, a symphony of anticipation building within you. Feel the gentle acceleration as you lift off, leaving the palm-fringed beaches and turquoise waters of Diani behind.

Gaze down upon the undulating landscape, a tapestry of emerald green forests, ochre-colored earth, and glistening rivers. The pilot, with his intimate knowledge of the terrain, will point out landmarks and share captivating stories of the region, adding a layer of authentic discovery to your flight. This curated experience is more than just a transfer; it’s an opportunity to witness the raw beauty of Kenya from a privileged vantage point.

The air is crisp and clean as you soar above the clouds, the vast African sky stretching out before you. This intimate flight provides a tranquil interlude, a chance to reflect on the memories created in Diani and to anticipate the adventures that await you in Nairobi. Soon, the sprawling cityscape of Nairobi will emerge on the horizon, a vibrant contrast to the serene coastal landscape. As you descend towards Wilson Airport, prepare to be immersed in the energy and excitement of Kenya's capital, ready to continue your bespoke journey through this captivating land.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelFor: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.description: You'll be met by a representative of Wilderness  and transferred from Wilson Airport to Jomo Kenyatta Airport by private vehicle.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Wilson Airport in Nairobi
segments.travelForName: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.title: Wilson Airport to Jomo Kenyatta Airport
segments.description_enhanced:
Embark on a seamless and exclusive transition from the vibrant energy of Wilson Airport to the international gateway of Jomo Kenyatta Airport. Upon your arrival at Wilson, a dedicated representative from Wilderness will be awaiting you, ready to whisk you away in the comfort of a private vehicle.

Forget the chaos of shared transportation; this is a curated experience designed for the discerning traveller. Settle into the plush leather seats as the Nairobi skyline unfolds before you. Feel the gentle hum of the engine as you glide through the city, leaving behind the smaller aircraft and anticipation for adventures further afield.

The journey itself becomes an intimate glimpse into the heart of Nairobi. Observe the vibrant tapestry of daily life unfolding – the bustling markets, the elegant architecture, the verdant parks – all from the sanctuary of your private transfer. Let the sights, sounds, and even the subtle scents of the city wash over you, a final sensory immersion into the Kenyan spirit before your departure.

This is more than just a transfer; it's a moment of refined relaxation, a chance to reflect on the memories made and anticipate the journeys to come. Allow Wilderness to handle every detail, ensuring a flawless and authentic end to your East African adventure, leaving you refreshed and ready for your onward flight from Jomo Kenyatta Airport.

segments.description: On arrival at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, a Tradewinds Aviation Services representative will meet you at the departure hall with your name on a signboard. The representative will assist you to the check-in counter to check-in and then through customs and immigration.
segments.name: Meet and Greet service (departure)
segments.title: Meet and Greet service (departure)
segments.description_enhanced:
**Meet and Greet service (departure) in Nairobi, Kenya**

As your extraordinary Kenyan adventure draws to a close, allow us to ensure a seamless and utterly stress-free departure from Jomo Kenyatta International Airport. The culmination of your bespoke journey deserves nothing less than an exclusive, personalized farewell.

Upon your arrival at the departure hall, a dedicated Tradewinds Aviation Services representative will be waiting to greet you with a warm smile and a clearly displayed signboard bearing your name – a welcome beacon in the bustling terminal. Feel a sense of calm wash over you as you relinquish the anxieties of airport navigation.

This isn't just assistance; it's a curated experience designed to elevate your departure. Your representative will expertly guide you to the appropriate check-in counter, ensuring the swift and effortless handling of your luggage and travel documents. Breathe deeply and savour the lingering scents of the Kenyan air, knowing that every detail is being meticulously managed.

Beyond check-in, you'll be escorted through the often-intimidating processes of customs and immigration. Your Tradewinds representative will navigate these procedures with practiced ease, streamlining your passage and allowing you to reflect on the unforgettable memories you've created during your time in Kenya. Enjoy the authentic and gracious service that exemplifies Kenyan hospitality, right up until the moment you step towards your gate, ready for your onward journey. This intimate and personalized service guarantees a truly refined ending to your luxury Kenyan escape.

segments.description: Transit Point via Jomo Kenyatta Airport in Nairobi
segments.description_enhanced:
**Title:** Seamless Departure

**Location:** Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, Nairobi

As your extraordinary African adventure draws to a close, your journey culminates at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport in Nairobi, a transit point humming with the energy of travelers from every corner of the globe. This isn't just an airport; it's a gateway, a bridge between the untamed beauty you’ve experienced and the familiar comforts awaiting you.

Allow yourself a moment to reflect on the breathtaking landscapes, the captivating wildlife encounters, and the vibrant cultures you’ve immersed yourself in during your bespoke journey. Perhaps the scent of the Kenyan earth still lingers faintly in your memory, a reminder of the authentic experiences that have shaped your perspective.

While this marks the end of your curated itinerary, it doesn't have to signify the end of your reverie. As you navigate the airport's modern facilities, consider indulging in a final cup of rich Kenyan coffee, savoring its complex aroma and earthy notes, a perfect encapsulation of your time spent in this remarkable country. The exclusive lounges offer havens of tranquility, where you can unwind and reflect on the memories you’ve made, far from the bustling terminal.

This transit point is more than just a connection; it’s an opportunity to seamlessly transition back into your everyday life, carrying with you the profound impact of an unforgettable African experience. Embrace the anticipation of sharing your stories and photographs, allowing the spirit of adventure to continue to inspire you long after you’ve left Kenyan soil. Feel the gentle hum of the engines as you prepare for takeoff, carrying the warmth of Africa within you, ready to embark on the next chapter of your journey, forever changed by the magic you have witnessed.

itineraries.filePrefix: A Luxury Kenyan Honeymoon - Bush & Beach -1762899654270

mapPoints.description:
Between the rolling Ngong Hills and the vast Nairobi National Park lies Hemingways Nairobi, a boutique all-suite hotel offering a serene escape from the bustle of the city. Set in the leafy suburb of Karen, just minutes from cultural landmarks like the Karen Blixen Museum and the Giraffe Centre, it is perfectly placed for both relaxation and exploration. 

The spacious suites feature vaulted ceilings, elegant living spaces, and private terraces with sweeping views. Every detail is considered, from personalised butler service to luxury bathroom amenities, promising the highest level of comfort. During your stay, enjoy the hotel’s brasserie and bar, an indulgent spa, outdoor pool, and fitness centre, creating a retreat that feels both luxurious and personal. 

Days here can be as leisurely or adventurous as you wish. Spot wildlife on the edge of Nairobi National Park, tee off at nearby Karen Golf Club, or visit the Daphne Sheldrick Animal Orphanage to see rescued elephants up close. Evenings invite you to return for fine dining and a cocktail at sunset, framed by the hills. 

INSIDER’S TIP: Ask your butler to arrange a morning excursion into Nairobi National Park, you might spot lions hunting with the city skyline in the distance.
mapPoints.title: Hemingways Nairobi

mapPoints.description:
Located within the 57,000-acre Loisaba Conservancy, Loisaba Lodo Springs has been purposely designed for guests to enjoy the sweeping views over this magical area in northern Kenya. Elegant in design and opulent in décor, the camp features eight spacious en-suite rooms, each with large floor-to-ceiling doors and windows, as well as beautiful polished wooden floors. The private verandah embraces the camp’s tranquil setting, ensuring that guests enjoy breathtaking vistas of the Laikipia plains from every vantage point. The main area incorporates a cozy lounge, dining area, and a relaxing infinity swimming pool.

INSIDER’S TIP: For a unique cultural experience, spend an afternoon down at the traditional Maasai village – a great opportunity to see how the residents live, watch a dance performance, and admire their intricate beadwork.
mapPoints.title: Elewana Loisaba Lodo Springs

mapPoints.description:
Perched high above the Great Rift Valley, Angama Mara delivers some of the most dramatic views in Africa, 1,000 feet above the wildlife-rich plains of the Maasai Mara. Its name, meaning “suspended in mid-air” in Swahili, captures the dreamlike magic of this extraordinary location. Just a short 10-minute drive from the Mara Triangle, the lodge sits on a 700-hectare private site with direct access to the reserve and unmatched exclusivity.

Each tented suite is positioned along the escarpment’s edge, offering uninterrupted panoramas through floor-to-ceiling glass fronts. Inside, expect king beds, sleek wooden decks, and elegant interiors that blur the line between safari and luxury. A rim-flow pool, fitness room with valley views, a curated safari shop, and a hands-on photographic studio add thoughtful detail to the experience.

Spend your days tracking the Big Five on game drives, soaring over the savannah in a hot-air balloon, walking along the escarpment, or exploring the Map Room for a deeper understanding of the region. 

Insider’s Tip: Visit the Photographic Studio during your stay, whether you're a seasoned photographer or a total beginner, you can book a private editing session or even print your own mini portfolio to take home.
mapPoints.title: Angama Mara

mapPoints.description:
Escape to Alfajiri Cliff Villa, where your dream getaway awaits. Perched on a coral cliff overlooking the Indian Ocean, this exclusive villa promises unrivalled privacy and breathtaking views. 

Renowned as one of the world’s most romantic bedrooms, the opulent Turret Suite boasts 270-degree panoramic views of the ocean, an ideal spot for honeymooners. The Villa also features two double bedrooms on the first floor and a twin bedroom on the ground floor, accommodating groups of up to nine guests. 

Relaxation knows no bounds here, whether it's sunrise yoga on the generous verandah, a dip in the infinity pool, or strolling through the lush private garden. Your dedicated butler ensures every need is met, from personalised dining experiences to arranging in-villa wellness treatments.

Embark on a culinary journey with all meals and beverages included, featuring exquisite South African wines and premium spirits. itineraries.itineraryName: A Family Adventure to Southern Africa in search of the Big Seven
itineraries.name: A Family Adventure to Southern Africa in search of the Big Seven

segments.description: Transit Point via Cape Town International Airport in Cape Town

On arrival at Cape Town International Airport, a Menzies representative will meet you with your name on a signboard when you enter the main terminal building. The representative will assist you through customs and immigration (if on an international flight) and to collect your luggage. You are accompanied to the arrivals hall to meet your transfer driver for your onward journey.
segments.name: Meet and Assist at Cape Town
segments.title: Meet and Assist at Cape Town

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Cape Town International Airport in Cape Town
segments.travelFor: One&Only Cape Town
segments.description: You will be met by a representative of Wilderness Touring Cape Town and transferred from Cape Town International Airport to One&Only Cape Town by private vehicle.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Cape Town International Airport in Cape Town
segments.travelForName: One&Only Cape Town
segments.title: Cape Town International Airport to One&Only Cape Town

segments.description:
The One&Only Cape Town is a luxurious resort set against the stunning backdrop of Table Mountain, offering an idyllic blend of natural beauty and sophisticated comfort. With spacious, well-appointed rooms and suites that boast sweeping views of either the marina or the mountain, this world-class resort provides an unparalleled experience of relaxation and indulgence. Guests can enjoy exceptional dining at Nobu, one of the world’s most renowned restaurants, and explore a variety of other dining and bar options, including the contemporary Italian cuisine at Isola and the relaxed atmosphere at Vista Bar & Lounge. The resort’s award-winning One&Only Spa is the perfect place to unwind, while its prime location offers easy access to Cape Town's vibrant attractions, including the nearby V&A Waterfront.

The KidsOnly programme offers fun, supervised activities for children, with tailored experiences for older kids — making it a great choice for families.

INSIDER'S TIP: For a memorable experience, try booking a private cabana by the pool for the day. It offers the perfect combination of privacy and luxury, complete with attentive service and unforgettable views.
segments.title: One&Only Cape Town
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Island Family Suite: Breakfast and 15% VAT;  Welcome bottle of Wine; Bespoke Bar Cart featuring One&Only Cape Town complimentary Infused Fynbos Liqueur Gin; Personal Pantry with complimentary non-alcoholic beverages; Garment pressing service daily - one outfit per guest, per day.
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Island Family Suite: Includes: Breakfast only.

segments.description:
Lace up your hiking books and follow the trail as it loops from Kloof Nek up to the top of Lion’s Head. This is an easy to moderate hike that rewards you with spectacular views out over Cape Town’s City Bowl and the Atlantic. On a clear day you can even see Robben Island in the distance.

The popular hike is best tackled either first thing in the morning, or in the early evening. It takes approximately an hour to reach the summit (669m or 2,195 feet), but the hike can be broken up into sections to allow you to have time to stop and take in the changing views as you loop around the mountain. 

You may choose to plan for a picnic once you reach the top, or if you find yourself in the Mother City during a full moon, join the local hikers at the summit for a spectacular moon rise. 

The hike includes two sets of short ladders bolted to the rock face.
segments.name: Lions Head Hike
segments.title: Lions Head Hike

segments.description: You will be met by a Wilderness guide and have a private vehicle at your disposal.
segments.name: Vehicle and Driver
segments.title: Vehicle and Driver

segments.description: Cycling Peninsula - Cycle through the Cape of Good Hope reserve for a sensual immersion of the peninsula's unique natural environment
segments.name: Cycling - Half Day Peninsula

segments.travelEx: One&Only Cape Town
segments.travelFor: Grootbos Garden Lodge
segments.description: You will be met by a representative of Wilderness Touring Cape Town and transferred from One&Only Cape Town to Grootbos Garden Lodge by private vehicle.
segments.travelExName: One&Only Cape Town
segments.travelForName: Grootbos Garden Lodge
segments.title: One&Only Cape Town to Grootbos Garden Lodge

segments.description:
Nestled between mountain and sea, the Grootbos Private Nature Reserve is a five-star eco-paradise showcasing the incredible Flora and Marine life of the Southern Tip of Africa. Home of the "Marine Big 5" - whales, sharks, dolphins, seals and penguins; and with unparalleled floral diversity, Grootbos offers you a one-of-a-kind luxury African experience. Garden Lodge offers panoramic views and every suite offers complete privacy. Garden Lodge lies in an indigenous garden with stone walls and a warm African ambience. Each suite is nestled between the fynbos with a private sundeck to soak up the tranquillity and view. A creative gourmet cuisine, using home-grown organic vegetables and the freshest local produce, is complemented by fine local wines. Dedicated conservationists accompany guests daily on awe-inspiring excursions to explore the flora, fauna, bird and marine life of the area by foot, boat, horseback or in an open 4x4 vehicle. From June to December marvel at the Southern Right Whales that may be viewed from the rocky cliffs, pure white beaches, by boat or light airplane.

INSIDER'S TIP: We are in the heart of the Cape Floral Kingdom - the smallest but richest of the six floral kingdoms – and at Grootbos 760 of the 9000 fynbos species found in the Cape grow here.
roomNames: FB++  : Two Bedroom Luxury Family Suite
segments.title: Grootbos Garden Lodge
segments.rooms: Two Bedroom Luxury Family Suite x 1
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Two Bedroom Luxury Family Suite: Accommodation, all meals, horse riding/pony rides, guided walks including fynbos nature tours and Milkwood walks, Nature, marine & coastal drives and walks including the Walker Bay Nature Reserve, De Kelders cliff walk, Klipgat Cave combined with seasonal land-based whale watching, transfers to/from all activities., , N.B.:  Grootbos can only confirm which lodge a guest will stay at for the period 1 Oct to 31 Mar NOT for the period 1 Apr to 30 Sep
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Two Bedroom Luxury Family Suite: Accommodation, all meals, horse riding/pony rides, guided walks including fynbos nature tours and Milkwood walks, Nature, marine & coastal drives and walks including the Walker Bay Nature Reserve, De Kelders cliff walk, Klipgat Cave combined with seasonal land-based whale watching, transfers to/from all activities.

segments.description:
Head to the charming fishing town of Gansbaai to spend some time looking for southern right whales. This renowned whale watching mecca is home to the Marine Big 5 which includes southern right whales, seals, penguins, dolphins and great white sharks. 

After a quick briefing you will board the boat for your nautical safari. You'll visit 'Shark Alley', Geyser Rock and Dyer Island and learn a variety of species and conservation efforts from experts on board.
segments.name: Whale Watching with Dyer Island Cruises
segments.title: Whale Watching with Dyer Island Cruises(Marine Dynamics)

segments.travelForName: Thornybush Game Lodge
segments.title: Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport to Thornybush Game Lodge

segments.description:
Adjacent to the Greater Kruger National Park, the pristine 11 500-hectare Thornybush Nature Reserve is home to a huge diversity of mammal and bird species. The elegant and exclusive Thornybush Game Lodge boasts 18 stylish air-conditioned luxury suites and two family suites, all with extensive living areas overlooking the seasonal Monwana River. Sweeping vistas over the savannah and a busy waterhole can be enjoyed from each suite. Enjoy exciting dawn and dusk safaris in open Land Rovers, or choose a walking safari. Take a moment to browse our library, enjoy a treatment in the Beauty Spa or relax at the pool with your favourite cocktail. Superb attention to detail and highly personalised service make for a memorable stay.

INSIDER’S TIP: There is an open-air boma (barbeque area) where dinners are served around a bonfire.
segments.title: Thornybush Game Lodge
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Villa: Private meals and game drive vehicle, all local drinks (soft drinks, house wine, selection of local beers, local spirits) and Wi-Fi.
segments.clientIncludeExclude:
Villa: Includes: All meals, selected alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, scheduled shared safari activities and daily laundry.
Excludes: Champagne.

segments.travelEx: Transit Point via Victoria Falls Airport in Victoria Falls
segments.travelFor: Matetsi Victoria Falls
segments.description: You will be met by a Wilderness Touring Zambezi representative for your private transfer from Victoria Falls Airport to Matetsi Victoria Falls. Please note that your pick-up time will be advised locally the evening before.
segments.travelExName: Transit Point via Victoria Falls Airport in Victoria Falls
segments.travelForName: Matetsi Victoria Falls
segments.title: Victoria Falls Airport to Matetsi Victoria Falls

segments.description:
Wake up on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River at Matetsi Victoria Falls. Tucked away along 27 kilometres of private river frontage, Matetsi Victoria Falls blends contemporary African luxury with the raw beauty of its surroundings. The lodge’s vibrant interiors pay homage to Zimbabwe’s rich heritage, showcasing copper accents from the country’s mining history and bold blue hues inspired by the legendary river itself. Each of the river-facing suites offers a front-row seat to the outdoors, complete with a private plunge pool, a spacious veranda, and floor-to-ceiling windows that blur the line between indoors and out. Designed for comfort and style, the suites feature local materials, intricate carvings, and modern touches that create a warm, inviting atmosphere.
Matetsi’s two intimate camps, with their own dining spaces, fire-lit lounges, and interactive kitchens, offer a personalised experience – whether you're enjoying a meal under the stars or relaxing by the fire bowl. For families or groups, the exclusive-use Matetsi River House offers a private villa with its own dedicated chef, butler and safari team, for an unparalleled experience.

INSIDER’S TIP: Don’t miss a soak in the outdoor tub, where you can unwind while watching the mesmerising flow of the river. It’s the perfect way to end a day on safari.
segments.title: Matetsi Victoria Falls
segments.agentIncludeExclude: Family Suite: Scheduled Luxury Return Transfer to/from Matetsi from/to within the Victoria Falls area, i.e. VF town, VF Airport & VF borders with Botswana/Zambia. Scheduled Tour of the Falls experience including a guided walking Tour of the Falls with option of earlier transfer for guests doing additional activities (once per guest per stay) including Tour of the Falls parks fees (up to USD 50 per person), Safari activities including game drives with a private 4x4 safari vehicle, birdwatching, safari walks, a sunrise or sunset boat cruise on the Zambezi River (1 x private boat cruise per stay) and additional boat cruises subject to availability, amateur fishing, accommodation, laundry, three meals daily, the house selection of non-alcoholic & alcoholic beverages, emergency medical evacuation insurance.
segments.clientIncludeExclude: Family Suite: Includes: All meals, selected alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, scheduled shared safari activities and daily laundry.

segments.description:
Take to the skies on an unforgettable 13-minute helicopter flight over the awe-inspiring Victoria Falls, the world's largest sheet of falling water. This unique perspective, famously dubbed the "Flight of the Angels" by David Livingstone, offers breathtaking views of the cascading waters and their immense power.

From your aerial vantage point, marvel at the grandeur of the falls as the helicopter manoeuvres left and right for perfect views. The adventure continues upriver along the Zambezi and concludes with a stunning flyover of the Zambezi National Park.

Elevate your experience and witness nature's masterpiece from a perspective like no other!
segments.name: Flight of Angels Helicopter Tour
segments.title: Flight of Angels Helicopter Tour

segments.description: Upon arrival at O.R. Tambo International Airport, you will be met in the main terminal building by a Menzies Aviation representative carrying a name board. If arriving on an international flight, they will assist you through customs and immigration, and guide you to collect your luggage. You will then be escorted to the arrivals hall to meet your transfer driver for your onward journey.

itineraries.filePrefix: A Family Adventure to Southern Africa in search of the Big Seven-1762899654273

mapPoints.description:
The One&Only Cape Town is a luxurious resort set against the stunning backdrop of Table Mountain, offering an idyllic blend of natural beauty and sophisticated comfort. With spacious, well-appointed rooms and suites that boast sweeping views of either the marina or the mountain, this world-class resort provides an unparalleled experience of relaxation and indulgence. Guests can enjoy exceptional dining at Nobu, one of the world’s most renowned restaurants, and explore a variety of other dining and bar options, including the contemporary Italian cuisine at Isola and the relaxed atmosphere at Vista Bar & Lounge. The resort’s award-winning One&Only Spa is the perfect place to unwind, while its prime location offers easy access to Cape Town's vibrant attractions, including the nearby V&A Waterfront.

The KidsOnly programme offers fun, supervised activities for children, with tailored experiences for older kids — making it a great choice for families.

INSIDER'S TIP: For a memorable experience, try booking a private cabana by the pool for the day. It offers the perfect combination of privacy and luxury, complete with attentive service and unforgettable views.
mapPoints.title: One&Only Cape Town

mapPoints.description:
Nestled between mountain and sea, the Grootbos Private Nature Reserve is a five-star eco-paradise showcasing the incredible Flora and Marine life of the Southern Tip of Africa. Home of the "Marine Big 5" - whales, sharks, dolphins, seals and penguins; and with unparalleled floral diversity, Grootbos offers you a one-of-a-kind luxury African experience. Garden Lodge offers panoramic views and every suite offers complete privacy. Garden Lodge lies in an indigenous garden with stone walls and a warm African ambience. Each suite is nestled between the fynbos with a private sundeck to soak up the tranquillity and view. A creative gourmet cuisine, using home-grown organic vegetables and the freshest local produce, is complemented by fine local wines. Dedicated conservationists accompany guests daily on awe-inspiring excursions to explore the flora, fauna, bird and marine life of the area by foot, boat, horseback or in an open 4x4 vehicle. From June to December marvel at the Southern Right Whales that may be viewed from the rocky cliffs, pure white beaches, by boat or light airplane.

INSIDER'S TIP: We are in the heart of the Cape Floral Kingdom - the smallest but richest of the six floral kingdoms – and at Grootbos 760 of the 9000 fynbos species found in the Cape grow here.
mapPoints.title: Grootbos Garden Lodge

mapPoints.description:
Adjacent to the Greater Kruger National Park, the pristine 11 500-hectare Thornybush Nature Reserve is home to a huge diversity of mammal and bird species. The elegant and exclusive Thornybush Game Lodge boasts 18 stylish air-conditioned luxury suites and two family suites, all with extensive living areas overlooking the seasonal Monwana River. Sweeping vistas over the savannah and a busy waterhole can be enjoyed from each suite. Enjoy exciting dawn and dusk safaris in open Land Rovers, or choose a walking safari. Take a moment to browse our library, enjoy a treatment in the Beauty Spa or relax at the pool with your favourite cocktail. Superb attention to detail and highly personalised service make for a memorable stay.

INSIDER’S TIP: There is an open-air boma (barbeque area) where dinners are served around a bonfire.
mapPoints.title: Thornybush Game Lodge

mapPoints.description:
Wake up on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River at Matetsi Victoria Falls. Tucked away along 27 kilometres of private river frontage, Matetsi Victoria Falls blends contemporary African luxury with the raw beauty of its surroundings. The lodge’s vibrant interiors pay homage to Zimbabwe’s rich heritage, showcasing copper accents from the country’s mining history and bold blue hues inspired by the legendary river itself. Each of the river-facing suites offers a front-row seat to the outdoors, complete with a private plunge pool, a spacious veranda, and floor-to-ceiling windows that blur the line between indoors and out. Designed for comfort and style, the suites feature local materials, intricate carvings, and modern touches that create a warm, inviting atmosphere.
Matetsi’s two intimate camps, with their own dining spaces, fire-lit lounges, and interactive kitchens, offer a personalised experience – whether you're enjoying a meal under the stars or relaxing by the fire bowl. For families or groups, the exclusive-use Matetsi River House offers a private villa with its own dedicated chef, butler and safari team, for an unparalleled experience.

INSIDER’S TIP: Don’t miss a soak in the outdoor tub, where you can unwind while watching the mesmerising flow of the river. It’s the perfect way to end a day on safari.
mapPoints.title: Matetsi Victoria Falls
